name: Julia Tutorials
tagline: Julia tutorial is created for data science use cases
body:
# Julia Tutorial

Hi all welcome to Julia tutorial. I have been working on Julia from past 2 years and thought of creating a tutorial which will help
anyone who wants to work on Data Science projects using Julia. 

Contents of the tutorial:
* [DataFrames](https://github.com/Jugaadu/Julia/blob/master/DataFrames%20in%20Julia.ipynb)


Data used:
* [home_data.csv](Julia/home_data.csv)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
